Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.InterfaceDAOs

Interface ITypeDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockTypeDAO, SqliteTypeDAO
public interface ITypeDAO
CRUD interface for interacting with types in a database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addType(Type type)
    Adds a new type to a database.
    void
    deleteType(Type type)
    Deletes a type in a database, should be chosen by the type ID.
    Type
    findTypeByID(int typeID)
     
    Type
    findTypeByName(String typeName)
     
    List<Type>
    getAllTypes()
    Gets all types in a database, should set all values in the Type model.
    void
    updateType(Type type)
    Updates an type in the database, the type ID should be used to find which type to update.

  • Method Details

    • addType

      int addType(Type type)
      Adds a new type to a database. The ID should be set by the database.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to add.

    • updateType

      void updateType(Type type)
      Updates an type in the database, the type ID should be used to find which type to update.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to update, the ID should be set.

    • deleteType

      void deleteType(Type type)
      Deletes a type in a database, should be chosen by the type ID.
      Parameters:
      type - The type to delete, the ID value should be set.

    • getAllTypes

      List<Type> getAllTypes()
      Gets all types in a database, should set all values in the Type model.
      Returns:
      A list of types.

    • findTypeByName

      Type findTypeByName(String typeName)

    • findTypeByID

      Type findTypeByID(int typeID)
